title: A driver slams into a family, killing four people, in what Canadian police say was an anti-Islamic hate crime
content:
1. A driver slams into a family, killing four people, in what Canadian police say was an anti-Islamic hate crime  CNN
  2. Police say a driver who hit and killed 4 pedestrians in Ontario targeted them because they were Muslim  Yahoo News
  3. 4 killed in London, Ont. collision likely targeted for being Muslim, police say  Global News
  4. SIMS: A typical Forest City family out for a walk. Until hatred attacked  London Free Press (Blogs)
  5. Canadian police say family run down targeted as Muslims  Devdiscourse
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
contentSnippet:
A driver slams into a family, killing four people, in what Canadian police say was an anti-Islamic hate crime  CNN 
Police say a driver who hit and killed 4 pedestrians in Ontario targeted them because they were Muslim  Yahoo News

localize.title: ドライバーが家族に衝突し、4人が死亡 カナダ警察は反イスラムの憎悪による犯罪と発表
一名司机撞向一个家庭，造成4人死亡，加拿大警方称这是一起反伊斯兰教的仇恨犯罪。
一名司機撞向一個家庭，造成4人死亡，加拿大警方稱這是一起反伊斯蘭教的仇恨犯罪。
